EventHubAppId.description: App ID for the app registration with access to the event hub.

EventHubAppSecret.description: Client secret for the app registration with access to the event hub.

EventHubSkipUnchanged.description: Option to only send changed data to event hub.

EventHubEndpointUrl.description: Full URL for the event hub namespace including the queue.

EventHubTenant.description: The tenant in which the event hub is installed.

LogAnalyticsAppId.description: App ID for the app registration with access to the log analytics workspace.
LogAnalyticsAppId.defaultTextIfEmpty: Reporting is not yet installed. Follow this guide (https://simeoncloud.github.io/docs/#/reporting) or complete these variables to install reporting.

LogAnalyticsAppSecret.description: Client secret for the app registration with access to the log analytics workspace.
LogAnalyticsAppSecret.defaultTextIfEmpty: Reporting is not yet installed. Follow this guide (https://simeoncloud.github.io/docs/#/reporting) or complete these variables to install reporting.

LogAnalyticsEndpointUrl.description: URL to the log analytics workspace.
LogAnalyticsEndpointUrl.defaultTextIfEmpty: Reporting is not yet installed. Follow this guide (https://simeoncloud.github.io/docs/#/reporting) or complete these variables to install reporting.

LogAnalyticsSkipUnchanged.description: Option to only send changed data to log analytics.
LogAnalyticsSkipUnchanged.defaultTextIfEmpty: Reporting is not yet installed. Follow this guide (https://simeoncloud.github.io/docs/#/reporting) or complete these variables to install reporting.

LogAnalyticsTenant.description: The tenant in which log analytics is installed.
LogAnalyticsTenant.defaultTextIfEmpty: Reporting is not yet installed. Follow this guide (https://simeoncloud.github.io/docs/#/reporting) or complete these variables to install reporting.

SimeonSyncIntegrationAppId.description: App registration that can be used for all Simeon Cloud Integrations.
SimeonSyncIntegrationAppId.defaultTextIfEmpty: Reporting is not yet installed. Follow this guide (https://simeoncloud.github.io/docs/#/reporting) or complete these variables to install reporting.

SimeonSyncIntegrationAppSecret.description: Client secret for shared integration app registration.
SimeonSyncIntegrationAppSecret.defaultTextIfEmpty: Reporting is not yet installed. Follow this guide (https://simeoncloud.github.io/docs/#/reporting) or complete these variables to install reporting.

SimeonSyncIntegrationTenant.defaultTextIfEmpty: Reporting is not yet installed. Follow this guide (https://simeoncloud.github.io/docs/#/reporting) or complete these variables to install reporting.

SqlAzureAppId.description: App registration with access to the Azure SQL Server.

SqlAzureAppSecret.description: Client secret for the app registration with access to to the Azure SQL Server.

SqlAzureServerName.description: Name of the Azure SQL Server.

SqlAzureSkipUnchanged.description: Option to only send changed data to SQL Azure.

SqlAzureTenant.description: The tenant in which the Azure SQL Server is installed.

ErrorNotificationEmailAddresses.description: The email addresses Sync error information will be sent to. These must be semicolon delineated with no spaces.

ExcludePipelinesFromEmail.description: Pipelines that will be excluded from the summary email.

ExcludeUsersFromSummaryEmail.description: Email addresses that will be excluded from the summary email. These must be semicolon delineated with no spaces.

FromEmailAddress.description: The email address from which the summary email is sent.

SendSummaryEmailToAddresses.description: The email addresses that the summary email will be sent to. These must be semicolon delineated with no spaces.

SmtpPort.description: The SMTP port to send summary email, defaults to 587.

SmtpServer.description: The Smtp server to send summary emails, defaults to smtp.office365.com.

SmtpUser.description: The user used to authenticate into the SMTP server to send the summary email.

ToBccAddress.description: The email addresses that the summary email will send to as BCC. These must be semicolon delineated with no spaces.

ToCCAddress.description: The email addresses that the summary email will send to as CC. These must be semicolon delineated with no spaces.

BaselinePropagationMode.description: Baseline propagation determines whether changes made to your baseline will automatically propagate to your downstream tenants with your approval. This setting determines the enablement of baseline propagation.

DisableErrorReporting.description: This disables automated alerts for when your Sync fails. You can disable this if you don't want your error data sent to Simeon Cloud's support ticketing system.

M365ManagementToolVersion.description: The Sync version that your tenants are running on.
M365ManagementToolVersion.defaultTextIfEmpty: Changing this may break your Sync pipeline.
